Generate high-quality Anki-style flashcards for the topic 'Responsibility Assignment' (Category: Cybersecurity > Security And Risk Management > Risk Management Concepts > Risk Treatment and Response > Treatment Plan Development > Responsibility Assignment). **Context and Prerequisites:** Builds on risk identification/assessment. Positioned in NIST CSF 2.0 Govern (GV.RR) and RMF (SP 800-37 Rev. 2): Establishes roles/responsibilities/authorities for accountability in control implementation. **Incorporate These Elements:** - Learning Objectives: [Insert the full learning_objectives array here]. - Scaffolding: Use 4 layers progressively (Layer 1 Foundation, Layer 2 Components, etc.) [Insert full scaffolding details]. - Active Learning: Tie flashcards to activities like RACI scenarios, role debates [Insert active_learning details]. - Concept Map: GV.RR central -> Roles branches -> Accountability arrows. **Flashcard Output Format (JSON array of objects):** Each flashcard as: {'type': 'MCQ|Q&A|Scenario', 'bloom_level': 'Remember|etc.', 'scaffolding_layer': '1|2|3|4', 'front': 'Question text', 'back': {'answer': '...', 'explanation': '... (link to NIST, objectives)', 'references': ['NIST CSF 2.0 GV.RR', 'SP 800-37 Rev. 2'], 'active_tie_in': 'Discussion prompt link (optional)'}}. Follow flashcard_schema exactly, including distractor protocol for MCQs. Generate 25 flashcards: 30% Layer 1-2 (basic), 40% Layer 3 (apply), 30% Layer 4 (integrate). Ensure web-grounded accuracy from NIST sources. Output only valid JSON.
